overview: ABBA's spectacular image is discussed. The glitter, the glamour, the record covers and videos left a strong visual impact. 1		The Winner Takes It All 2		Gimme! Gimme ! Gimme! (A Man After Midnight) 3		The Name Of The Game 4		I Do, I Do, I Do, I Do, I Do 5		SOS 6		Thank You For The Music 7		Dancing Queen 8		Chiquitita 9		The Day Before You Came 10		On And On And On 11		Voulez-Vous 12		Does Your Mother Know 13		Happy New Year 14		Waterloo 15		Knowing Me, Knowing You 16		When All Is Said And Done
title: ABBA: Absolute Image
